title: Avery Eastman
text: Hey! I’m Avery, I am a third-year undergraduate at Colorado State University, majoring in Ecosystem Science and Sustainability. I am keen to apply my knowledge of earth systems and sustainability science to real world applications. I hope to gain fieldwork and research experience to further my knowledge, skills and to build a professional network. Some of my interests include rock climbing, camping, and baking!

title: Resume
text:
Avery Eastman
Fort Collins, CO | 503-839-0802 | avery.eastman@icloud.com | https://www.linkedin.com/in/avery-eastman
SUMMARY:
I am a third-year undergraduate, emerging in environmental management and conservation science. I am keen to apply my knowledge of earth systems and sustainability science to real world applications. I hope to gain fieldwork and research experience to further my knowledge, skills and to build a professional network. My core competencies include:

Experience with ArcGIS tools and Excel
Organized and diligent worker, with the ability to analyze and interpret data

EDUCATION:
Ecosystem Science and Sustainability, May 2026
Colorado State University, Fort Collins, Colorado, GPA 3.60

Fort Collins, CO

Received a raise after less than a year in the position

Fort Collins, CO

title: Projects
text:
In spring of 2025 I took a Quantitative Reasoning class based in R.
My first project for this class was called Personal Portfolio. I was tasked with making a web page using R, RStudio, and Quarto.
In this project I:
• Learned how to create a basic website
• Render and push code to a github repo
• Got familiar with RMarkdown
Here is the link to my website’s homepage! Click here to view homepage
